snippet.title: Sublimity - Official Story Trailer [1] (2024)
snippet.description:
Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2880130/Sublimity/
Here are pictures for your thumbnails:
Discord: https://discord.gg/FJ2KvpdrRa

Backrooms Game Sublimity- Official Gameplay Trailer (2024)
https://youtu.be/B7CpoYNKKtM

Backrooms Level 37 "Sublimity"
https://youtu.be/jE5DakopgiY

The Backrooms Level 5 Terror Hotel - Sublimity
https://youtu.be/ZOSFPVe1pO8

Sublimity now on STEAM!
https://youtu.be/a7uzJ8wv21k

Sublimity: The Backrooms found Footage || Gameplay trailer
https://youtu.be/JM49c_mWQeE

My Backrooms Game | A year of progress
https://youtu.be/h4H4eHCzjKE

In this official Sublimity Story Trailer, get a sneak peek at the intense gameplay and stunning graphics of this new game. Level 37 Sublimity awaits you in backrooms game trailer- are you ready for the challenge?

Welcome to Sublimity trailer, this is an indie game that plunges players into the eerie depths of the back rooms as the protagonist, Chloe. Trapped in this surreal labyrinthine world, players must navigate their way through its unsettling environments while evading terrifying creatures lurking in the shadows. 

Get ready for a new indie game experience with benny backrooms trailer! Check out the official gameplay trailer for a sneak peek at this exciting new project from the benny backrooms trailer team. Stay tuned for more devlog updates coming soon!

As Chloe, your primary objective is survival, striving to endure long enough to uncover potential escape routes from this nightmarish realm. 

With a focus on the enigmatic Poolrooms, particularly Level 37, "Sublimity" offers a gripping blend of exploration, stealth, and survival horror, promising an immersive experience filled with tension and mystery. Can you guide Chloe to safety, or will she become another lost soul in the abyss of The Backrooms?

This game is the sequel to:
Welcome to The Backrooms - Do NOT Follow the LIGHT! Immerse yourself in a frightening and atmospheric horror story that will take you to the dark depths of an alternate reality. This is the official trailer of the game that gives you a taste of the eerie and disturbing world of The Backrooms.

You'll be thrown into an endless labyrinth of dark corridors and mysterious rooms. The trailer showcases the stunning visuals of Unreal Engine 5, which bring the creepy atmosphere and detailed environments to life. Immerse yourself in a world where the boundaries between reality and nightmare blur.

The game warns you about the seductive light that lures you into the backrooms. Because this light holds a deadly danger. The trailer shows the pulsating presence of the red light and reveals how it drives the protagonists to madness. Will you be able to resist or will you succumb to the temptations?
